document.full_text: western states are expected to push for syria to be referred to the u.n. security council after u.n. inspectors gave independent support to u.s. allegations the arab state was building a covert nuclear reactor, diplomats say.
document.title: west wants syria case sent to u.n. council: diplomats
lines_and_colors: western states are expected to push for syria to be referred to the u.n. security council after u.n. inspectors gave independent support to u.s. allegations the arab state was building a covert nuclear reactor, diplomats say.
